Class RectNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Net
      • RectNet

  • public class RectNet
extends Net
    Simple rectangular neural network.
    Author:
    saf

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RectNet()
      Constructs a new RectNet with 10 inputs and 5 layers of network.

      Constructs a new RectNet with given depth and number of inputs.

      Constructs a new RectNet with given depth and number of inputs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RectNet

        public RectNet()
        Constructs a new RectNet with 10 inputs and 5 layers of network.

      • RectNet

        public RectNet(int depth,
       int numInputs)
        Constructs a new RectNet with given depth and number of inputs.
        Parameters:
        depth - number of layers in the network
        numInputs - number of inputs to the network

      • RectNet

        public RectNet(int depth,
       int numInputs,
       boolean verb)
        Constructs a new RectNet with given depth and number of inputs. Sets the verbose boolean as given.
        Parameters:
        depth - number of layers in the network
        numInputs - number of inputs to the network
        verb - true when RectNet displays debug output.

    • Method Detail

      • setInputs

        public void setInputs(double[] inpts)
        Sets the inputs of this network to the values given. Length of inpts must be equal to the "height" of the network.
        Parameters:
        inpts - array of double to set as network inputs.

      • getOutput

        public double getOutput()
        Returns the output value from this network run.
        Specified by:
        getOutput in class Net
        Returns:
        output of this Net.

      • train

        public void train(double[] inpts,
         double desired,
         int iterations,
         double learningConstant)
        Trains the network on a given input with a given output the number of times specified by iterations. Trains via a backpropagation algorithm.
        Parameters:
        inpts - input values for the network.
        desired - what the result of the network should be.
        learningConstant - the "rate" at which the network learns
        iterations - number of times to train the network.

      • trainFile

        public static RectNet trainFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                boolean verbose)
        Train a neural network from a .augtrain training file
        Parameters:
        fileName - File path to .augtrain training file
        verbose - Flag to display debugging text or not
        Returns:
        The trained neural network

      • saveNet

        public void saveNet(java.lang.String fileName,
           RectNet net)
        Input a filename and a neural network to save the neural network as a .augsave file
        Parameters:
        fileName - Filepath ending in .augsave where the network will be saved
        net - Neural net to be saved

      • loadNet

        public static RectNet loadNet(java.lang.String fileName)
        Load a neural network from a .augsave file
        Parameters:
        fileName - File path to an .augsave file containing a neural network
        Returns:
        Neural network from the .augsave file
